mapper.select: select code from t_verifcode where mobile = #{mobile} and addtime>=now() and status=0 order by create_time limit 0,1
select * from t_verifcode where mobile = #{mobile} and addtime>=now() and status=0 order by create_time limit 0,1
select count(id) from t_verifcode where mobile=#{mobile} and ip=#{ip} and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into t_verifcode (mobile, code, msg,addtime,status,create_time,ip) values ( #{mobile}, #{code}, #{msg},date_add(#{addtime}, interval 5 minute),#{status},now(),#{ip})
mapper.update: update t_verifcode set status =#{status} where id=#{id}
update t_verifcode set status =#{status} where mobile = #{mobile} and addtime>=now() and status=0 order by create_time
